text: have you won today I'm making go up a

hit if you bring to a drinking table
let's begin you will need about 10
ounces or 300 gram of onion you can use
yellow or red onion cut into really thin
slices to the onion we add 2 tablespoons
of sugar and 4 tablespoons of vinegar
mix really well and set aside for about
30 minutes then we will have some sweet

here I have 2 whole beef shank which
weighs around 2 pals or 900 gram it's
important that you buy the whole shrank
like this for this dish and the flora
ask your butcher foot play the shrinks
into a pressure cooker and filled with
enough water to cover then smash about
20 gram of ginger and then also drop
into the pot bring to a boil and then
cover the lid and lower the heat cook
for about 15 to 20 minutes and turn off
the heat when the pressure cooker comes
out completely open the lid and take out
the beef look at this it shrinks really
a whole lot let it cool down and then
thinly slice against the grain I really
love beef shank because of the chewy
texture and also the beautiful marbled
effect it has on every beef slice if you
don't have a pressure cooker you can
also use a normal pot but you need to
cook a lot longer about 40 to 50 minutes
until is fork tender do not over cook
the beef though because if it's too soft
is very difficult to cut into slices
like this
next in a Morten peso combines some
